item.title: Bold Vision Group
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: A full-service real estate company that specializes in buying, selling, and renting properties in Nairobi.
item.content:encoded: A full-service real estate company that specializes in buying, selling, and renting properties in Nairobi.

item.title: Kua Ventures
item.description: Kua Ventures is a source of affordable capital, coaching, and community for faith-driven, social enterprises in East Africa; creating quality jobs & changing lives while also displaying the love of Christ. https://www.traditionrolex.com/12
item.content:encoded:
Kua Ventures is a source of affordable capital, coaching, and community for faith-driven, social enterprises in East Africa; creating quality jobs & changing lives while also displaying the love of Christ.

https://www.traditionrolex.com/12

item.title: endPoverty
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Since 1985, endPoverty has helped build over 400,000 entrepreneurs in 47 countries around the world. They continue to work towards a day when individuals, families and communities trapped in poverty become economically and spiritually empowered.
item.content:encoded: Since 1985, endPoverty has helped build over 400,000 entrepreneurs in 47 countries around the world. They continue to work towards a day when individuals, families and communities trapped in poverty become economically and spiritually empowered.

item.title: Eden Ridge
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Built on years of tradition and dedicated to innovating the luxury real estate industry, Eden Ridge offers transformative experiences through a network of exceptional agents.
item.content:encoded: Built on years of tradition and dedicated to innovating the luxury real estate industry, Eden Ridge offers transformative experiences through a network of exceptional agents.

item.title: Naisula School
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Located only 74kms from Nairobi, Naisula School is set in the serene plains of Maasailand. They offer a conducive learning environment for a student, away from the hustle and bustle of the city life.
item.content:encoded: Located only 74kms from Nairobi, Naisula School is set in the serene plains of Maasailand. They offer a conducive learning environment for a student, away from the hustle and bustle of the city life.

item.title: Enkarsis
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Nested in the throbbing heart of Kisaju-Kitengela, Enkarsis is a single 4-bedroom villa property with an extensive lawn and parking facility.
item.content:encoded: Nested in the throbbing heart of Kisaju-Kitengela, Enkarsis is a single 4-bedroom villa property with an extensive lawn and parking facility.

item.title: The Leadership Dialogues
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The Leadership Dialogues explores authentic, African leadership relevant to our times.
item.content:encoded: The Leadership Dialogues explores authentic, African leadership relevant to our times.

item.title: Mwaliko / Royal Oaks Residency
item.description: These Gorgeous, Warm 4 and 5-bedroom All ensuite apartments offers, Opulent Living With A Fabulous Feel and a Perfect Lifestyle Property To Treasure. https://www.traditionrolex.com/13
